message: I'll take the lion's share, but I'm feeling generous.  This is my offer, take it or leave it.
Alice, your offer was a bit lopsided. Let's be fair, I think this split is much more reasonable.
Alright, Bob, let's be a bit more even. I'm willing to come down to 55/45.  This is my final offer.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere.  A 50/50 split is the only fair solution.  Let's end this here.
